channel.title: Comments on: Started playing with Hadoop

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Downgrading to 0.20.x now - Hive does not support 0.21.x :(
item.content:encoded: Downgrading to 0.20.x now – Hive does not support 0.21.x üôÅ

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Just in case anyone encounters "Hadoop common not found" problem while running start-dfs.sh and start-mapred.sh, check <a href="https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HADOOP-6953" rel="nofollow">HADOOP-6953</a>, in short, need to set HADOOP_HOME in environment before running those two scripts.
item.content:encoded: Just in case anyone encounters “Hadoop common not found” problem while running start-dfs.sh and start-mapred.sh, check HADOOP-6953, in short, need to set HADOOP_HOME in environment before running those two scripts.

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
I have 6 machines in the cluster, s1 acts as primary name node and s2 acts as secondary name node and job tracker, all 6 machines (s1~s6) are data nodes as well (so they are running data nodes and task tracker). I guess I have everything setup but need time to confirm that.
I think I need to have Hive or something similar.
item.content:encoded:
I have 6 machines in the cluster, s1 acts as primary name node and s2 acts as secondary name node and job tracker, all 6 machines (s1~s6) are data nodes as well (so they are running data nodes and task tracker). I guess I have everything setup but need time to confirm that.

I think I need to have Hive or something similar.
